titleStmt.title: Certaine arguments and motives of speciall moment propounded to the consideration of our most noble King and state tending to perswade them to abolish that unhappy and unhallowed government of our church by bishops, and in stead thereof to set up the government of the Lord Iesus Christ and his holy ordinances in their purity and power.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, last p. torn.
Reproduction of original in: Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
